overview: Rebel vicar Peter ministers to an inner-city parish where he lives with his Samoan boyfriend, Jason. Jason, a reformed criminal, now runs the church Youth Centre.  Crusading Peter proposes to Jason – very publicl. Jason is wary. Anglicans are not allowed a sanctified marriage.  As news of the forbidden marriage explodes into the media, Peter finds himself under siege. His sermons are a battleground for opposing factions and the Bishop threatens to withdraw funding for the youth club. Friends and family rally around.  Jason’s gender fluid nephew Billy, arrives from Australia insisting he’s an angel sent to bless the union. And he’ll put on a drag show at the church to help raise money for the youth club.  The strain proves too much and Jason moves out.  In a surprising climax Peter is humbled. And Billy’s amazing show helps unite the couple, though not as they expected.
tagline: When a media storm threatens the marriage between a Vicar and his Samoan boyfriend something extraordinary happens.
title: Mysterious Ways
